mapper.select:
SELECT a.id,a.no,a.tracking_no,a.cus_code,a.cus_name,a.currency_code,a.currency_name,a.amount, a.warehouse_code,a.warehouse_name,a.pay_method,a.business_category,a.product_code,a.product_category, a.charge_category,a.charge_type,a.create_by_name,a.create_time,a.update_by_name,a.update_time, a.create_by,a.update_by,a.remark,a.order_time,a.payment_time,a.ref_no,a.shipment_service,a.weight, a.calc_weight,a.specifications,a.nature,a.amazon_logistics_route_id,a.country,a.country_code
FROM `fss_account_serial_bill` a
ORDER BY a.payment_time DESC
select * from del_outbound where order_no=#{no} LIMIT 0,1

select FASB.cus_code as cusCode,FASB.currency_code as currencyCode,
sum( case when ( FASB.pay_method in ('ONLINE_INCOME','OFFLINE_INCOME','EXCHANGE_INCOME') or FASB.business_category in ('优惠','赔偿','退费') ) then abs(FASB.amount) else 0 end ) as currentIncomeAmount,
sum( case when ( FASB.pay_method in ('EXCHANGE_PAYMENT','WITHDRAW_PAYMENT','BALANCE_DEDUCTIONS','WAREHOUSE_RENT','BUSINESS_OPERATE','SPECIAL_OPERATE') or FASB.business_category in ('补收','增值消费','仓租') ) then abs(FASB.amount) else 0 end ) as currentExpenditureAmount
from fss_account_serial_bill as FASB
and FASB.cus_code = #{cusCode}
and FASB.payment_time >= (#{billStartTime})
and FASB.payment_time <= (#{billEndTime})
and FASB.cus_code in
#{item}
group by FASB.cus_code,FASB.currency_code

select FASB.charge_category as chargeCategory,FASB.currency_code as currencyCode, FASB.warehouse_code as warehouse, sum(FASB.amount) as amount, FASB.remark from fss_account_serial_bill as FASB
and FASB.cus_code = #{cusCode}
and FASB.payment_time >= (#{billStartTime})
and FASB.payment_time <= (#{billEndTime})
group by FASB.charge_category,FASB.warehouse_code,FASB.currency_code

select FASB.charge_type as chargeType,FASB.business_category as businessCategory, FASB.charge_category as chargeCategory,FASB.`no`,FASB.id, DOB.order_type as orderType from fss_account_serial_bill as FASB inner join del_outbound as DOB on FASB.`no` = DOB.order_no where FASB.nature is null limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
select count(1) from fss_account_serial_bill as FASB inner join del_outbound as DOB on FASB.`no` = DOB.order_no where FASB.nature is null

select a.currency_code as currencyCode, sum( CASE WHEN a.business_category in ('线下充值','退费','优惠','赔偿') and a.charge_type not in ('汇率转换充值') THEN abs(a.amount) ELSE 0-abs(a.amount) END ) AS amount from fss_account_serial_bill as a
group by a.currency_code

SELECT a.nature, DOB.shipment_rule_name as shipmentRuleName, DOB.shipment_rule as shipmentRule, a.cus_code AS cusCode, a.warehouse_name AS warehouseName, a.`business_category` AS businessCategory, a.charge_category AS chargeCategory, sum( CASE WHEN a.business_category in ('线下充值','退费','优惠','赔偿') and a.charge_type not in ('汇率转换充值') THEN abs(a.amount) ELSE 0-abs(a.amount) END ) AS amount, a.currency_code AS currencyCode, a.currency_name as currencyName FROM fss_account_serial_bill a left join del_outbound as DOB on a.no = DOB.order_no
GROUP BY a.cus_code, a.warehouse_name, a.charge_category, a.currency_code, a.nature, a.charge_type

SELECT a.id,a.no,a.tracking_no,a.cus_code,a.cus_name,a.currency_code,a.currency_name, (CASE WHEN a.business_category in ('线下充值','退费','优惠','赔偿') and a.charge_type not in ('汇率转换充值') THEN abs(a.amount) ELSE 0-abs(a.amount) END) as amount, a.warehouse_code,a.warehouse_name,a.pay_method,a.business_category,a.product_code,a.product_category, a.charge_category,a.charge_type,a.create_by_name,a.create_time,a.update_by_name,a.update_time, a.create_by,a.update_by,a.remark,a.order_time,a.payment_time,a.ref_no,a.shipment_service,a.weight, a.calc_weight,a.specifications,a.nature,a.serial_number,a.amazon_logistics_route_id,a.country_code,a.country, a.charge_type FROM `fss_account_serial_bill` a
ORDER BY a.id DESC
